body.name: Jennov 2K Light Bulb Security Camera Wireless Outdoor - Cameras for Home Security Outside, 2.4 Ghz WiFi Light Socket Indoor Camera, Auto Tracking, AI Human Detection, Compatible with Alexa - 2 Pcs
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 11 mins
features: 📷【3MP HD Image & Color Night Vision】- With 3MP pixels (2304*1296P), the ring outdoor camera captures every detail in ultra-high definition resolution, providing you with clearer surveillance images, even in daylight and in the dark. Equipped with 4 high quality IR lights and 4 yellow flood LED bulbs, the advanced color night vision function ensures the best night vision experience and can give you more peace of mind.

🔔【Human Motion Detection & Auto Tracking & Siren Alarm】- Jennov light bulb camera is the best choice for your home security. Home security cameras advanced body detection and intelligent tracking technology automatically tracks the movement of target objects within a 355° horizontal and 120° vertical rotation range. In the event of an intruder, it will send sound and light alerts as well as real-time push notifications to help you take timely action.

💡【2.4 Ghz Wi-Fi & Easy Installation】- The cameras for home security indoor uses 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi technology to provide a high-speed, stable connection to ensure smooth live streaming and video playback. Plus, installation and use are simple - just plug the light camera into an E27 socket.(5G not supported)

📞【Two-Way Talk & Multi-User Sharing】- Experience two-way speak and easy sharing with our wireless light socket camera. With the camera's built-in microphone and speaker, you can talk directly to your loved ones on your phone and stay in touch with them. Plus, you can share access to the outdoor security cameras with multiple users, making it easy for your family to watch whenever they want. Making your life easier and smarter.

🌐【Compatible with Alexa & 24/7 SD/Cloud Recording】- With its Alexa compatibility, you can view and play back live streams and footage from the surveillance & security cameras. In addition, the wireless security camera offers two convenient storage options: cloud storage and SD card storage. Securely stored in the cloud, you can access footage anytime, anywhere, without the risk of losing or damaging the SD card.

What is the app used for this light bulb camera? Does it support alexa and auto tracking? The app used is EseeCloud, which is described in detail in the manual and comes with a QR code containing a link to download it from the app store, which is compatible with alexa and supports automatic tracking. Does the camera support 5G Wi-Fi? Can it be waterproof? Jennov 3MP Camera only supports 2.4GHz WiFi (not 5G) , it can be installed using a normal E27 bulb socket (110V~240V), and has a water-resistant outer case (for indoor and outdoor use). Can this light bulb camera be used as a porch light night? This Camera has 4 fill light. It can perfectly present a clear and colorful picture at night. However, due to the limited light exposure range of the camera itself, it is recommended that users with lighting needs use it with ordinary light sources. Can I use the camera without an SD card? Do I have to subscribe to the camera every month? There is no need to buy an SD card or subscribe to cloud storage if you only need to watch online without storage. For more details on cloud storage, see the EseeCloud app. Does the camera support Onvif/Rtsp protocol? How to contact the seller with questions? Our light bulb camera are onvif enabled by default and also support the rtsp protocol. We offer three ways of contacting us - phone, email and online chat - and you can find our contact details in the brochure.
